summary: German biopic loosely based on the World War I fighter ace Manfred Von Richthofen, nicknamed the Red Baron by friend and foe alike.
cast: Tomás Koutník|Tomás Ibl|Albert Franc|Matthias Schweighöfer|Maxim Mehmet|Hanno Koffler|Til Schweiger|Richard Krajco|Joseph Fiennes|Steffen Schroeder|Lukás Príkazský|Lena Headey|Ondrej Volejník|Jirí Wohanka|Iveta Jirícková|Vlastina Svátková|Axel Prahl|Gitta Schweighöfer|Volker Bruch|Brano Holicek|Julie Engelbrecht|Jan Vlasák|Luise Bähr|Irena Máchová|Robert Nebrenský|Ralph Misske|Tino Mewes|Jacob Erftemeijer|Josef Vinklár|Ladislav Frej|Brian Caspe|Denny Ratajský|Pavel Myslik|Václav Jílek|Adam Misík|Vladislav Rousek|Barbora Ujfalusi|Patrik Plesinger|Jirí Lastovka|Rostislav Novák Jr.|Zdenek Pecha|Jirí Kout|Jan Unger|Igor Chmela|Karsten Kaie|Vit Sky|Radek Bruna|Gérard Robert Gratadour
keywords: loosely based on historical events|prussian soldier|aviation|cockpit|pilot
title: Der Rote Baron
